lead_paragraph: JAMESON--Virginia. Born Virginia V. Yannello in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, 1941. Died July 29th, 2014, Newtown, PA. Attended St. John Villa Academy, Staten Island. Beloved wife, mother and friend. In lieu of flowers, please make contributions to the Dementia Society of America, PO Box 600, Doylestown, PA 18901 or www.dementiasociety.org.
